abstract: Cleveland Police Sgt Robert Schwab is placed on administrative duty until investigation into why he deployed pepper-spray into crowd of people blocking police cruiser.
lead_paragraph: A transit police sergeant who deployed pepper-spray into a crowd in Cleveland has been placed on administrative duty until an investigation of the incident is completed, officials said.

headline.main: Ohio: Transit Officer on Desk Duty After Pepper Spray Was Used
headline.print_headline: Cleveland: Transit Officer on Desk Duty After Pepper Spray Was Used

snippet: A transit police sergeant who deployed pepper-spray into a crowd in Cleveland has been placed on administrative duty until an investigation of the incident is completed, officials said.
